title: Panel For Turban, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp face plain weave, patterned by warp stripes and extra-weft floats inserted in shed A only, bound by every 10th foundation warp (MS'69)
provenance:
Purchased by donor in Nigeria.
Provenance supplied by donor.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 254 x 29.2 cm (8 ft. 4 in. x 11 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
description: Light tan and green striped fabric patterned by bands containing vertical herringbone motifs alternating in yellow and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel For Turban, 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: warp face plain weave, patterned by warp stripes and extra-weft floats inserted in shed A only, bound by every 10th foundation warp (MS'69). Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman. 1969-11-5.
